p: We compared the GDM model projected onto current conditions to the GDM model projected onto 2070 climate predictions as an indication of the amount of genomic change required to keep pace with changes in selective pressures resulting from environmental change (‘genomic vulnerability’, ( Bay et al., 2018)) ( Figure 3B). For the middle north region and the southern areas towards the coast (red in Figure 3B), the model predicted more intense natural selection in response to climate change, thus indicating that these areas should be prioritized for assisted migration.
